summary: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.
cast: Samuel L. Jackson|Christina Ricci|Justin Timberlake|S. Epatha Merkerson|John Cothran|David Banner|Michael Raymond-James|Adriane Lenox|Kim Richards|Neimus K. Williams|Leonard L. Thomas|Ruby Wilson|Claude Phillips|Amy Lavere|Clare Grant|Jeff Pope|Charles 'Skip' Pitts|Willie Hall|John Malloy|T.C. title: Black Snake Moan
